직업 I

CLASSES I

바바리안

BARBARIAN

성향: 질서를 제외한 모든 성향

히트 다이스: d12.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

바바리안의 직업 스킬(핵심 능력): 등반(Str), 제작(Int), 동물 조련(Cha), 위협(Cha), 도약(Str), 듣기(Wis), 탑승(Dex), 생존(Wis), and 수영(Str).

첫 레벨에서 스킬 포인트: (4 + Int 수정치) x4.

레벨이 오를 때마다 추가 스킬 포인트: 4 + Int 수정치.

표: 바바리안

직업 특성
Class Features

All of the following are 직업 특성 of 바바리안.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: A 바바리안 is proficient with all simple and martial 무기, 빛 갑옷, medium 갑옷, and 방패(except tower 방패).

Fast 이동(Ex): A 바바리안’s land 속도 is faster than the norm for his race by +10 feet. This benefit applies only when he is wearing no 갑옷, 빛 갑옷, or medium 갑옷 and not carrying a heavy load. Apply this 보너스 before modifying 바바리안’s 속도 because of any load carried or 갑옷 worn.

Illiteracy: 바바리안 are the only characters who do not automatically know how to read and write. A 바바리안 may spend 2 skill points to gain the ability to read and write all languages he is able to 말하기.

A 바바리안 who gains a 레벨 in any other class automatically gains literacy. Any other character who gains a 바바리안 레벨 does not lose the literacy he or she already had.

격노(Ex): A 바바리안 can 비행 into a 격노 a certain number of times per day. In a 격노, a 바바리안 temporarily gains a +4 보너스 to 근력, a +4 보너스 to 건강, and a +2 의욕 보너스 on Will 내성 굴림, but he takes a –2 페널티 to 방어도. The increase in 건강 increases 바바리안’s 히트 포인트 by 2 points per 레벨, but these 히트 포인트 go away at the end of 격노 when his 건강 score drops back to normal. (These extra 히트 포인트 are not lost first the way 임시 히트 포인트 are.) While raging, a 바바리안 cannot use any 매력-, 민첩-, or 지능-based 스킬(except for 균형, 탈출 전문가, 위협, and 탑승), 집중 skill, or any 능력 that require patience or 집중, nor can he cast 주문 or 마법 아이템 사용 that require a 명령 word, a spell 신관(such as a wand), or spell completion (such as a scroll) to function. He can use any feat he has except 전투 숙련, 아이템 제작 특기, and 메타마법 특기. A fit of 격노 lasts for a number of rounds equal to 3 + the character’s (newly improved) 건강 수정치. A 바바리안 may prematurely end his 격노. At the end of the 격노, 바바리안 loses 격노 수정치 and restrictions and becomes fatigued (–2 페널티 to 근력, –2 페널티 to 민첩, can’t 돌격 or 달리기) for 지속시간 of the current encounter (unless he is a 17th-레벨 바바리안, at which point this limitation no longer applies; see below).

A 바바리안 can 비행 into a 격노 only once per encounter. At 1 레벨 he can use his 격노 ability once per day. At 4 레벨 and every four 레벨 thereafter, he can use it one additional time per day (to a maximum of six times per day at 20th 레벨). Entering a 격노 takes no time itself, but a 바바리안 can do it only during his action, not in response to someone else’s action.

Uncanny 회피(Ex): At 2nd 레벨, a 바바리안 retains his 민첩 보너스 to AC (if any) even if he is caught flat-footed or struck by an invisible attacker. However, he still loses his 민첩 보너스 to AC if immobilized. If a 바바리안 already has uncanny 회피 from a different class, he automatically gains improved uncanny 회피(see below) instead.

함정 감각(Ex): Starting at 3rd 레벨, a 바바리안 gains a +1 보너스 on Reflex 내성 굴림 made to avoid 함정 and a +1 회피 보너스 to AC against 공격 made by 함정. These 보너스 rise by +1 every three 바바리안 레벨 thereafter (6th, 9th, 12th, 15th, and 18th 레벨). 함정 감각 보너스 gained from multiple classes stack.

Improved Uncanny 회피(Ex): At 5th 레벨 and higher, a 바바리안 can no longer be flanked. This defense denies a 도적 the ability to sneak 공격 바바리안 by 협공 him, unless the attacker has at least four more 도적 레벨 than the target has 바바리안 레벨. If a character already has uncanny 회피(see above) from a second class, the character automatically gains improved uncanny 회피 instead, and 레벨 from the classes that grant uncanny 회피 stack to determine the minimum 레벨 a 도적 must be to flank the character.

피해 축소(Ex): At 7 레벨, a 바바리안 gains 피해 축소. Subtract 1 from 피해 바바리안 takes each time he is dealt 피해 from a weapon or a natural 공격. At 10 레벨, and every three 바바리안 레벨 thereafter (13th, 16th, and 19th 레벨), this 피해 축소 rises by 1 point. 피해 축소 can reduce 피해 to 0 but not below 0.

상급 격노(Ex): At 11th 레벨, a 바바리안’s 보너스 to 근력 and 건강 during his 격노 each increase to +6, and his 의욕 보너스 on Will 내성 굴림 increases to +3. 페널티 to AC remains at –2.

Indomitable Will (Ex): While in a 격노, a 바바리안 of 14th 레벨 or higher gains a +4 보너스 on Will 내성 굴림 to resist 부여술 주문. This 보너스 stacks with all other 수정치, including 의욕 보너스 on Will 내성 굴림 he also receives during his 격노.

Tireless 격노(Ex): At 17th 레벨 and higher, a 바바리안 no longer becomes fatigued at the end of his 격노.

힘센 격노(Ex): At 20th 레벨, a 바바리안’s 보너스 to 근력 and 건강 during his 격노 each increase to +8, and his 의욕 보너스 on Will 내성 굴림 increases to +4. 페널티 to AC remains at –2.

전 바바리안
Ex-Barbarians

A 바바리안 who becomes lawful loses the ability to 격노 and cannot gain more 레벨 as a 바바리안. He retains all the other benefits of the class (피해 축소, fast 이동, 함정 감각, and uncanny 회피).

음유시인

BARD

성향: 질서를 제외한 모든 성향

히트 다이스: d6.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

음유시인의 직업 스킬(핵심 능력): 감정(Int), 균형(Dex), 허세(Cha), 등반(Str), 집중(Con), 제작(Int), 문자 해독(Int), 외교(Cha), 변장(Cha), 탈출 전문가(Dex), 정보 수집(Cha), 숨기(Dex), 도약(Str), 지식(모든 지식 스킬 각각에 명시됨) (Int), 듣기(Wis), 조용히 이동(Dex), 공연 (Cha), 전문직(Wis), 의도 파악(Wis), 날렵한 손재주(Dex), 언어 말하기(n/a), 주문학(Int), 수영(Str), 재주넘기(Dex), 마법 장치 사용(Cha).

첫 레벨에서 스킬 포인트: (6 + Int 수정치) x4.

레벨이 오를 때마다 추가 스킬 포인트: 6 + Int 수정치.

직업 특성
Class Features

All of the following are 직업 특성 of 음유시인.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: A 음유시인 is proficient with all simple 무기, plus the longsword, rapier, sap, short sword, shortbow, and whip. 음유시인 are proficient with 빛 갑옷 및 방패(except tower 방패). A 음유시인 can cast 음유시인 주문 while wearing 빛 갑옷 without incurring the normal arcane 주문 실패 chance. However, like any other arcane spellcaster, a 음유시인 wearing medium or heavy 갑옷 or using a 방패 incurs a chance of arcane 주문 실패 if the spell in question has a somatic component (most do). A multiclass 음유시인 still incurs the normal arcane 주문 실패 chance for 비전 주문 received from other classes.

주문: A 음유시인 casts 비전 주문, which are drawn from 음유시인 spell list. He can cast any spell he knows without preparing it ahead of time. Every 음유시인 spell has a verbal component (singing, reciting, or music). To learn or 주문 시전, a 음유시인 must have a 매력 score equal to at least 10 + the spell. The 난이도 등급 for a 내성 굴림 against a 음유시인’s spell is 10 + the spell 레벨 + 음유시인’s 매력 수정치.

Like other spellcasters, a 음유시인 can cast only a certain number of 주문 of each spell 레벨 per day. His base daily spell allotment is given on 표: 음유시인. In addition, he receives 보너스 주문 per day if he has a high 매력 score. When 표: 음유시인 주문 Known indicates that 음유시인 gets 0 주문 per day of a given spell 레벨, he gains only 보너스 주문 he would be entitled to based on his 매력 score for that spell 레벨.

음유시인’s selection of 주문 is extremely limited. A 음유시인 begins play knowing four 0-레벨 주문 of your choice. At most new 음유시인 레벨, he gains one or more 새로운 주문, as indicated on 표: 음유시인 주문 Known. (Unlike 주문 per day, the number of 주문 a 음유시인 knows is not affected by his 매력 score; the numbers on 표: 음유시인 주문 Known are fixed.)

Upon reaching 5th 레벨, and at every third 음유시인 레벨 after that (8th, 11th, and so on), a 음유시인 can choose to learn a new spell in place of one he already knows. In effect, 음유시인 “loses” the old spell in exchange for the new one. The new spell’s 레벨 must be the same as that of the spell being exchanged, and it must be at least two 레벨 lower than the highest-레벨 음유시인 spell 음유시인 can cast. A 음유시인 may swap only a single spell at any given 레벨, and must choose whether or not to swap the spell at the same time that he gains 새로운 주문 known for 레벨.

As noted above, a 음유시인 need not prepare his 주문 in advance. He can cast any spell he knows at any time, assuming he has not yet used up his allotment of 주문 per day for the spell’s 레벨.

Bardic 지식: A 음유시인 may make a special bardic 지식 check with 보너스 equal to his 음유시인 레벨 + his 지능 수정치 to see whether he knows some relevant information about local notable people, legendary items, or noteworthy places. (If 음유시인 has 5 or more ranks in 지식(history), he gains a +2 보너스 on this check.)

A successful bardic 지식 check will not reveal the powers of a magic item but may give a hint as to its general function. A 음유시인 may not take 10 or take 20 on this check; this sort of 지식 is essentially random.

DC Type of 지식
10 Common, known by at least a substantial minority drinking; common legends of the local population.
20 Uncommon but available, known by only a few people legends.
25 Obscure, known by few, hard to come by.
30 Extremely obscure, known by very few, possibly forgotten by most who once knew it, possibly known only by those who don’t understand the significance of 지식.

Bardic Music: Once per day per 음유시인 레벨, a 음유시인 can use his song or poetics to produce magical effects on those around him (usually including himself, if desired). While these 능력 fall under the category of bardic music and 묘사 discuss singing or playing instruments, they can all be activated by reciting poetry, chanting, singing lyrical songs, singing melodies, whistling, playing an instrument, or playing an instrument in combination with some spoken performance. Each ability requires both a minimum 음유시인 레벨 and a minimum number of ranks in 공연 skill to qualify; if a 음유시인 does not have the required number of ranks in at least one 공연 skill, he does not gain the bardic music ability until he acquires the needed ranks.

Starting a bardic music effect is a standard action. Some bardic music 능력 require 집중, which means the 음유시인 must take a standard action each round to maintain the ability. Even while using bardic music that doesn’t require 집중, a 음유시인 cannot cast 주문, 마법 아이템 사용 by spell completion (such as 두루마리), or 마법 아이템 사용 by magic word (such as 마법막대). Just as for casting a spell with a verbal component, a deaf 음유시인 has a 20% chance to fail when attempting to use bardic music. If he fails, the attempt still counts against his daily limit.

Countersong (Su): A 음유시인 with 3 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can use his music or poetics to counter magical effects that depend on sound (but not 주문 that simply have verbal 구성요소). Each round of the countersong, he makes a 공연 check. Any creature within 30 feet of 음유시인(including 음유시인 himself ) that is affected by a sonic or language-dependent magical 공격 may use 음유시인’s 공연 check result in place of its 내성 굴림 if, after 내성 굴림 is rolled, 공연 check result proves to be higher. If a creature within 거리 of the countersong is already under the effect of a noninstantaneous sonic or language-dependent magical 공격, it gains another 내성 굴림 against the effect each round it hears the countersong, but it must use 음유시인’s 공연 check result for the save. Countersong has no effect against effects that don’t allow 내성 굴림. 음유시인 may keep up the countersong for 10 rounds.

Fascinate (Sp): A 음유시인 with 3 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can use his music or poetics to cause one or more creatures to become fascinated with him. Each creature to be fascinated must be within 90 feet, able to see and hear 음유시인, and able to pay attention to him. 음유시인 must also be able to see the creature. The distraction of a nearby 전투 or other dangers prevents the ability from working. For every three 레벨 a 음유시인 attains beyond 1st, he can target one additional creature with a single use of this ability.

To use the ability, a 음유시인 makes a 공연 check. His check result is the DC for each affected creature’s Will save against the effect. If a creature’s 내성 굴림 succeeds, 음유시인 cannot attempt to fascinate that creature again for 24 hours. If its 내성 굴림 fails, the creature sits quietly and 듣기 to the song, taking no other actions, for as long as 음유시인 continues to play and concentrate (up to a maximum of 1 round per 음유시인 레벨). While fascinated, a target takes a –4 페널티 on 스킬 판정 made as reactions, such as 듣기 and 감지 checks. Any potential threat requires 음유시인 to make another 공연 check and allows the creature a new 내성 굴림 against a DC equal to the new 공연 check result.

Any obvious threat, such as someone drawing a weapon, casting a spell, or aiming a ranged weapon at the target, automatically breaks the effect. Fascinate is an 부여술 (compulsion), mind-affecting ability.

Inspire Courage (Su): A 음유시인 with 3 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can use song or poetics to inspire courage in his allies (including himself ), bolstering them against 공포 and improving their 전투 능력. To be affected, an ally must be able to hear 음유시인 sing. The effect lasts for as long as the ally hears 음유시인 sing and for 5 rounds thereafter. An affected ally receives a +1 의욕 보너스 on 내성 굴림 against charm and 공포 effects and a +1 의욕 보너스 on 공격 and weapon 피해 rolls. At 8th 레벨, and every six 음유시인 레벨 thereafter, this 보너스 increases by 1 (+2 at 8th, +3 at 14th, and +4 at 20th). Inspire courage is a mind-affecting ability.

Inspire Competence (Su): A 음유시인 of 3rd 레벨 or higher with 6 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can use his music or poetics to help an ally succeed at a task. The ally must be within 30 feet and able to see and hear 음유시인. The 음유시인 must also be able to see the ally.

The ally gets a +2 competence 보너스 on 스킬 판정 with a particular skill as long as he or she continues to hear 음유시인’s music. Certain uses of this ability are infeasible. The effect lasts as long as the 음유시인 concentrates, up to a maximum of 2 minutes. A 음유시인 can’t inspire competence in himself. Inspire competence is a mind-affecting ability.

제안(Sp): A 음유시인 of 6th 레벨 or higher with 9 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can make a 제안 (as the spell) to a creature that he has already fascinated (see above). Using this ability does not break 음유시인’s 집중 on the fascinate effect, nor does it allow a second 내성 굴림 against the fascinate effect.

Making a 제안 doesn’t count against a 음유시인’s daily limit on bardic music performances. A Will 내성 굴림(DC 10 + 1/2 음유시인’s 레벨 + 음유시인’s Cha 수정치) negates the effect. This ability affects only a single creature (but see 광역 제안, below). 제안 is an 부여술(compulsion), mind-affecting, language dependent ability.

Inspire Greatness (Su): A 음유시인 of 9th 레벨 or higher with 12 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can use music or poetics to inspire greatness in himself or a single willing ally within 30 feet, granting him or her extra fighting capability. For every three 레벨 a 음유시인 attains beyond 9th, he can target one additional ally with a single use of this ability (two at 12th 레벨, three at 15th, four at 18th). To inspire greatness, a 음유시인 must sing and an ally must hear him sing. The effect lasts for as long as the ally hears the 음유시인 sing and for 5 rounds thereafter. A creature inspired with greatness gains 2 보너스 히트 다이스 (d10s), the commensurate number of 임시 히트 포인트(apply the target’s 건강 수정치, if any, to these 보너스 히트 다이스), a +2 competence 보너스 on 명중 굴림, and a +1 competence 보너스 on Fortitude 내성 굴림. 보너스 히트 다이스 count as regular 히트 다이스 for determining the effect of 주문 that are 히트 다이스 dependant. Inspire greatness is a mind-affecting ability.

Song of 자유(Sp): A 음유시인 of 12th 레벨 or higher with 15 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can use music or poetics to create an effect equivalent to the 부여술 파괴 spell (시전자 레벨 equals the character’s 음유시인 레벨). Using this ability requires 1 minute of uninterrupted 집중 and music, and it functions on a single target within 30 feet. A 음유시인 can’t use song of 자유 on himself.

Inspire Heroics (Su): A 음유시인 of 15th 레벨 or higher with 18 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can use music or poetics to inspire tremendous 영웅심 in himself or a single willing ally within 30 feet. For every three 음유시인 레벨 the character attains beyond 15th, he can inspire heroics in one additional creature. To inspire heroics, a 음유시인 must sing and an ally must hear 음유시인 sing for a full round. A creature so inspired gains a +4 의욕 보너스 on 내성 굴림 and a +4 회피 보너스 to AC. The effect lasts for as long as the ally hears 음유시인 sing and for up to 5 rounds thereafter. Inspire heroics is a mind-affecting ability.

광역 제안(Sp): This ability functions like 제안, above, except that a 음유시인 of 18th 레벨 or higher with 21 or more ranks in a 공연 skill can make the 제안 simultaneously to any number of creatures that he has already fascinated (see above). 광역 제안 is an 부여술(compulsion), mind-affecting, language-dependent ability.

To prepare or 주문 시전, a 사제 must have a 지혜 score equal to at least 10 + the spell 레벨. 난이도 등급 for a 내성 굴림 against a 사제’s spell is 10 + the spell 레벨 + 사제’s 지혜 수정치.

Like other spellcasters, a 사제 can cast only a certain number of 주문 of each spell 레벨 per day. His base daily spell allotment is given on 표: 사제. In addition, he receives 보너스 주문 per day if he has a high 지혜 score. A 사제 also gets one domain spell of each spell 레벨 he can cast, starting at 1 레벨. When a 사제 prepares a spell in a domain spell slot, it must come from one of his two domains (see Deities, Domains, and Domain 주문, below).

사제 meditate or pray for their 주문. Each 사제 must choose a time at which he must spend 1 hour each day in quiet contemplation or supplication to regain his daily allotment of 주문. Time spent resting has no effect on whether a 사제 can prepare 주문. A 사제 may prepare and cast any spell on 사제 spell list, provided that he can cast 주문 of that 레벨, but he must choose which 주문 to prepare during his daily meditation.

Deity, Domains, and Domain 주문: A 사제’s deity influences his 성향, what magic he can 공연, his values, and how others see him. A 사제 chooses two domains from among those belonging to his deity. A 사제 can select an 성향 domain (Chaos, Evil, Good, or Law) only if his 성향 matches that domain.

Each domain gives 사제 access to a domain spell at each spell 레벨 he can cast, from 1st on up, as well as a granted power. 사제 gets the granted powers of both the domains selected.

With access to two domain 주문 at a given spell 레벨, a 사제 prepares one or the other each day in his domain spell slot. If a domain spell is not on 사제 spell list, a 사제 can prepare it only in his domain spell slot.

Spontaneous Casting: A good 사제(or a neutral 사제 of a good deity) can channel stored spell energy into 치료 주문 that the 사제 did not prepare ahead of time. 사제 can “lose” any prepared spell that is not a domain spell in order to cast any cure spell of the same spell 레벨 or lower (a cure spell is any spell with “cure” in its 이름).

An evil 사제(or a neutral 사제 of an evil deity), can’t convert prepared 주문 to cure 주문 but can convert them to inflict 주문(an inflict spell is one with “inflict” in its 이름).

A 사제 who is neither good nor evil and whose deity is neither good nor evil can convert 주문 to either cure 주문 or inflict 주문 (player’s choice). Once the player makes this choice, it cannot be reversed. This choice also determines whether 사제 turns or 명령 undead (see below).

Chaotic, Evil, Good, and Lawful 주문: A 사제 can’t cast 주문 of an 성향 opposed to his own or his deity’s (if he has one). 주문 associated with particular 성향 are indicated by the chaos, evil, good, and law descriptors in their 주문 설명.

A good 사제(or a neutral 사제 who worships a good deity) can turn or destroy undead creatures. An evil 사제 (or a neutral 사제 who worships an evil deity) instead rebukes or 명령 such creatures. A neutral 사제 of a neutral deity must choose whether his turning ability functions as that of a good 사제 or an evil 사제. Once this choice is made, it cannot be reversed. This decision also determines whether 사제 can cast spontaneous cure or inflict 주문(see above).

A 사제 may attempt to turn undead a number of times per day equal to 3 + his 매력 수정치. A 사제 with 5 or more ranks in 지식(religion) gets a +2 보너스 on turning checks against undead.

보너스 언어: A 사제’s 보너스 language options include Celestial, Abyssal, and infernal (the languages of good, chaotic evil, and lawful evil outsiders, respectively). These choices are in addition to 보너스 languages available to the character because of his race.

The effect lasts for 1 hour per 드루이드 레벨, or until she changes back. 형태 변환(to animal or back) is a standard action and doesn’t provoke an 공격 of opportunity.

A 드루이드 loses her ability to 말하기 while in animal form because she is limited to the sounds that a normal, untrained animal can make, but she can communicate normally with other animals of the same general grouping as her new form. (The normal sound a wild parrot makes is a squawk, so changing to this form does not permit speech.)

A 드루이드 can use this ability more times per day at 6th, 7th, 10th, 14th, and 18th 레벨, as noted on 표: 드루이드. In addition, she gains the ability to take the shape of a Large animal at 8th 레벨, a Tiny animal at 11th 레벨, and a Huge animal at 15th 레벨.

At 12th 레벨, a 드루이드 becomes able to use wild shape to change into a plant creature with the same size restrictions as for animal forms. (A 드루이드 can’t use this ability to take the form of a plant that isn’t a creature.)

At 16 레벨, a 드루이드 becomes able to use wild shape to change into a Small, Medium, or Large 정령(air, earth, fire, or water) once per day. These 정령 forms are in addition to her normal wild shape usage. In addition to the normal effects of wild shape, 드루이드 gains all 정령’s extraordinary, supernatural, and spell-like 능력. She also gains 정령’s 특기 for as long as she maintains the wild shape, but she retains her own creature type.

At 18th 레벨, a 드루이드 becomes able to assume 정령 form twice per day, and at 20th 레벨 she can do so three times per day. At 20th 레벨, a 드루이드 may use this wild shape ability to change into a Huge 정령.

Venom Immunity (Ex): At 9th 레벨, a 드루이드 gains immunity to all 독.

A Thousand Faces (Su): At 13 레벨, a 드루이드 gains the ability to change her appearance at will, as if using the 형체 번형 spell, but only while in her normal form.

보너스 still accrue, and 드루이드 still dies of old 나이 when her time is up.
